comment: Dr. Bohannon is one of my favorite professors at KSU! This class was so unlike any other classes I've taken that I loved it. There wasn't a set curriculum, as it was more discussion based. She really works hard to make the class a democratic environment and listens to her students concerns on deadlines and assignments. Would 100% take her again.

Dr. Bohannon is such an amazing professor. Take her if you can! She teaches so well, the classes are great, they are like a real work community. She gives clear instructions and grading. Dr. Bohannon also lets you revise work if you need it to show that you can do better on the assignment. She truly wants her students to succeed.

Dr. B is hilarious and amazing. She really goes the extra mile for her students and ensures that everyone does well. She doesn't like failing people and is always willing to work with you on getting a better grade. There are some writing assignments that are a little word heavy but nothing too hard. DEFINITELY her if you can.

Dr. Bohannon really believes in a democratic classroom and works hard to listen to her students and take ideas on how to shape assignments that work for everyone. She is passionate about the subject matter, about teaching and about her students. Whether you take her for a class in your major, or for an elective, it will be very worthwhile.

This class was so easy. We worked on a project the entire time and most days didn't have to stay the full time. This class didn't follow the initial syllabus, but even still Dr. B is a super nice lady and will help you out no matter what the problem is.

If you ever have the chance to take a course taught by Professor Bohannon, take it. She is a phenomenal professor. I can't criticize a single thing about her. She's understanding, respectful, enthusiastic, professional, and without a doubt the best college professor I've ever had. I learned more in this class than the rest of college combined.

Dr. Bohannon is one of my favorite professors! She's so cool and down to earth. She's always willing to help explain an assignment more or give you her thoughts - so just ask. HIGHLY recommend her class!

She's overall a great professor. Make sure you show up to class because she only goes over assignment guides once (unless you come in later with specific questions). She made the class easy to relate to and used interesting mediums (video, prezi, blogs) instead of just writing boring papers.
Would recommend to anyone! If you have the chance to have her class TAKE IT! One of the best professors at SPSUKSU.

Dr. Bohannon is the greatest English Professor at SPSU! The first couple weeks of class all we did was talk about random topics and changed all the due dates for the assignments. She is so compromising with everyone she will extend any assignment deadline for as long as you need! Just do your reading assignments and be engaged in class and BOOM A!!
